features: DEEP MOISTURE FOR DRY SKIN - Relieves dryness and replenishes moisture to improve skin’s tone, texture, and luminosity

FORMULATED WITH COLLAGEN AND ELASTIN - Our uniquely formulated firming lotion is infused with collagen and elastin and provides you with visibly toned and tight skin while also maintaining youthful and firm-looking skin
SMOOTH, TONED LOOK AFTER JUST 1 USE - Enhance the resilience of your skin with Jergens Firming Body Lotion Smooth, soft skin is just 1 use away
UNIQUE, ILLUMINATING HYDRALUCENCE BLEND - Formulated with our breakthrough Hydralucence blend and provides long-lasting hydration for visibly enhanced skin tone, texture, and luminosity
LIGHT, FRESH SCENT - Delightfully light fragrance leaves skin with a relaxing scent
body.description: Jergens Skin Firming Body Moisturizer replenishes skin's moisture while visibly tightening. Formulated with collagen and elastin, this lotion will visibly form and tone for youthful, beautiful skin. Enhance the look and feel of your skin in just one use, this moisturizer softens while restoring your skin. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Jergens moisturizing lotion provides effective, dermatologist-recommended long-lasting dry skin relief. Formulated with revitalizing, moisture-rich ingredients for dewy radiance, our Ultra Healing and Original Scent lotions heal and soothe extra dry skin. Whether you prefer glow-boosting lotion with a cherry-almond scent or replenishing body balm for smooth skin, you can't go wrong adding one of these moisturizing formulas to your daily skin care routine! Soothing ingredients like plant proteins, natural vitamins, and our unique hydralucence blend work together to create luminous, healthy skin.— Radiance-enhancing ingredients that absorb quickly — Dermatologist-tested to nourish and heal dry skin — Soften and smooth for visibly beautiful, healthy skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Omg the smelll
reviews.reviewText: OMG the smelll.Jergens Skin Firming Body Lotion has become my go-to solution for combating extra dry skin, and it's nothing short of fantastic. The inclusion of collagen and elastin in its formula makes it a powerhouse for skin tightening, leaving my skin noticeably firmer and more resilient.The Hydralucence Blend is a game-changer, providing deep hydration that lasts throughout the day without feeling greasy. It effortlessly tackles dryness, leaving my skin feeling silky-smooth and rejuvenated.What sets this lotion apart is its subtle yet delightful scent, making the application a sensory treat. The lightweight texture absorbs quickly, saving me from that sticky feeling associated with some other moisturizers.I've noticed a visible improvement in my skin's elasticity since incorporating this lotion into my daily routine. It's a reliable ally in the battle against dryness, and I highly recommend Jergens Skin Firming Body Lotion for those seeking both hydration and skin-tightening benefits.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helped get my post-pregnancy stomach back in shape: A complete review
reviews.reviewText: I just had my first baby at age 35 and one thing I wasn’t expecting was how loose my skin would be after giving birth. This lotion has helped tremendously with firming up lose skin on my stomach and making it look so much healthier. I am currently 8 weeks postpartum and have been using this lotion for the past 6 weeks and see a big improvement in the looseness and crepe-iness of my stomach.I had a healthy pregnancy, gaining a healthy amount of weight for my growing little one. But you forget that for all those 9 months your skin gets stretched to full capacity. I had a c section and if 9 months of stretch wasn’t bad enough, having your skin opened and retracted even more by forceps is even worse. After my c section I was horrified by the appearance my stomach, it was lumpy, loose, uneven and crepey. I vowed to find a way to get my skin and body back. After hours of researching expensive creams I found that this Jergens Firming Lotion had all the ingredients geared toward improving loose skin and at a mere $5 it was totally worth it.Our skin is made of up collagen and elastin which are what allows it to stretch and move. It also is what gives skin a youthful tight appearance. As we age collagen production in the body slows down and that is what contributes to our skin aging (.ie. wrinkling, looseness, sagging) This lotion contains both collagen and elastin which really help to “plump” up dry, loose skin. I saw a noticeable difference immediately. The lotion goes on smooth, rubs in entirely and is not heavy at all. After putting it on, my skin still feels clean, and not greasy at all. A lot of heavily moisturizing creams leave you feeling sticky or greasy but not this one, my skin just looks and feels hydrated without any residue. The pump makes it easy and convenient to put it on right after the shower. Lastly, the scent. I’m not sure what some other reviewers were complaining about but the Firming lotion is very lightly scented with just a fresh clean sort of smell. It’s not perfumey or floral smelling. I have a very strong sense of smell and this lotion doesn’t bother me. It goes on smelling clean and then I don’t smell a thing after it’s on.Now full disclosure... no cream is magic and cannot change the amount of loose skin someone has or magically shrink a belly back days after giving birth. But this lotion has really helped improve the look of my skin, the softness and also the health of my very damaged skin. In only 8 weeks my skin is back to looking like it used to prior to pregnancy. It also has improved the look of cellulite on my thighs which I’ve had since puberty. I cannot recommend this lotion enough to new Mommas out there or anyone looking to firm up loose, aging skin or improve cellulite. Im hooked on this Jergens Skin Firming body lotion. Hope this review helps anyone else in the same boat!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This the best one! Love the smell and it’s true to the name. My skin feels nice and tight and moisturized! Definitely the best flavor of Jergens lol!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It has a nice, calm smell. Decent price for a good product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing but not sticky
reviews.reviewText: I love this lotion. It moisturizes dry skin and gets rid of wrinkled skin without being greasy. It has a clean smell that is not overpowering. I have not been able to find this in the drug or grocery stores, so I am glad I have been able to find it on Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really? Jergens? I have tried lots of expensive skin firming creams. I am a 70 year old woman... You know, crepey arms and thighs, yuck. Well I am telling you that I saw improvement the next day! I sent two bottles to my sister. Love it! Also, the reviews that say it smells bad are wrong. Subtle fresh scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Came packaged nicely, great lotion, left my body feeling moisturized and smooth!!
Easily absorbed, good scent, feels great and not like it's a separate lining on your skin that will slough off.Don't know about firming... I don't think any cream would be able to achieve that!
I am using different kinds Jergens lotion in my whole life. But this is the first time I ordered this. Soo fragrant and so smooth. I love it. I Recommend this PRODUCT.
No reafirma nada pero humecta rico
